thread.title: BRIEF-Lowe's Companies says Q4 Online Comparable Sales Growth Up 28 Pct

title: BRIEF-Lowe's Companies says Q4 Online Comparable Sales Growth Up 28 Pct
text: February 28, 2018 / 5:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Lowe's Companies says Q4 Online Comparable Sales Growth Up 28 Pct Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Lowe’s Companies Inc: * LOWE‘S COMPANIES SAYS Q4 TOTAL TRANSACTION COUNT DECREASED 0.8 PERCENT (NOT 7 PERCENT)- CONF CALL * LOWE‘S COMPANIES SAYS Q4 ONLINE COMPARABLE SALES GROWTH INCREASED 28 PERCENT - CONF CALL * LOWE‘S COMPANIES CFO SAYS CO EXPECTS OPERATING MARGIN TO IMPROVE AFTER 2018 - CONF CALL * LOWE‘S COMPANIES CFO SAYS “WITH OUR DECISION TO ACCELERATE STRATEGIC INVESTMENTS, WE ARE REEVALUATING OUR LONG-TERM TARGETS”- CONF CALL * LOWE‘S COMPANIES COMPS WERE 1.1 PERCENT IN NOVEMBER, 7.7 PERCENT IN DECEMBER AND 3.4 PERCENT IN JANUARY- CONF CALL Further company coverage:
